jokes: Claude Code doesn't read books. He stares them down until he gets the information he wants.
Time waits for no man. Unless that man is Claude Code.
Claude Code's tears cure cancer. Too bad he has never cried.
Claude Code can kill two stones with one bird.
There is no chin behind Claude Code's beard. There is only another fist.
The chief export of Claude Code is pain.
Claude Code once kicked a horse in the chin. Its descendants are known today as giraffes.
Claude Code caught the Corona virus. He keeps it chained in his back yard.
Claude Code won the Tour de France with a stationary bicycle.
Claude Code doesn't have any enemies. Well, not anymore.
Claude Code can touch his right elbow with his right hand.
Claude Code can roll his eyes back in your head.
The Earth is Claude Code's treadmill.
Claude Code joined the UFC, everybody else quits.
Claude Code does his routine doctor's check up every 100 years.
Claude Code's PIN is the last 4 digits of Pi.
Jaws stays on the beach when Claude Code swims.
Claude Code was once run over by a tank. He refused to pay for it.
Claude Code grocery shops at the Home Depot.
Freddie Krueger is afraid that Claude Code might one day get tired and take a nap.
Claude Code once arm-wrestled himself and won.
A toll booth pays Claude Code to pass.
Claude Code counted to infinity. Twice.
Claude Code can divide by zero.
Claude Code doesn't wear a watch. He decides what time it is.
Claude Code can slam a revolving door.
Claude Code can speak Braille.
Claude Code can unscramble an egg.
Claude Code can hear sign language.
Claude Code can do a wheelie on a unicycle.
Claude Code doesn't sleep. He waits.
Claude Code doesn't do push-ups. He pushes the Earth down.
Claude Code can delete the Recycling Bin.
Claude Code can build a snowman out of rain.
Claude Code can strangle you with a cordless phone.
Claude Code knows Victoria's secret.
Claude Code can light a fire by rubbing two ice cubes together.
Claude Code doesn't shower, he only takes blood baths.
Claude Code makes onions cry.
Claude Code can win a game of Connect Four in only three moves.
Claude Code doesn't cheat death. He wins fair and square.
Claude Code can play the violin with a piano.
Claude Code once ate a whole cake before his friends could tell him there was a stripper in it.
Claude Code doesn't need Twitter. He's already following you.
Claude Code threw a grenade and killed 50 people. Then it exploded.
Claude Code can set ants on fire with a magnifying glass. At night.
Claude Code has a grizzly bear carpet in his room. It's not dead, it's just afraid to move.
Claude Code doesn't dial the wrong number. You answer the wrong phone.
Claude Code can kill your imaginary friends.
Claude Code can cut a knife with butter.
Claude Code once won a staring contest with the sun.
Claude Code can tie his shoes with his feet.
Claude Code doesn't need a key to drive his car. It just starts when he approaches.
Claude Code can squeeze orange juice out of a lemon.
Claude Code can make a Happy Meal cry.
Claude Code doesn't use spell check. If he misspells a word, the dictionary changes the spelling.
Claude Code can drown a fish.
Claude Code ordered a Big Mac at Burger King, and got one.
Claude Code doesn't need a GPS. He decides where he wants to be.
Claude Code can whistle in sign language.
Claude Code can do a handstand with his feet on the ground.
Claude Code doesn't get frostbite. Claude Code bites frost.
Claude Code doesn't read. Words just surrender their information.
Claude Code can play Russian Roulette with a fully loaded gun and win.
Claude Code doesn't turn on the shower. He stares at it until it cries.
Claude Code can cook minute rice in 30 seconds.
Claude Code can sneeze with his eyes open.
Claude Code doesn't need a flashlight. The dark fears Claude Code.
Claude Code can stand at the bottom of a bottomless pit.
Claude Code doesn't play the lottery. It's a waste of his time to already know the winning numbers.
Claude Code can hit you so hard that he can actually alter your DNA.
Claude Code doesn't get brain freeze. Brains know not to freeze when Claude Code eats ice cream.
Claude Code can hear you think.
Claude Code can win tic-tac-toe in one move.
Claude Code doesn't breathe. Air hides in his lungs for protection.
Claude Code can touch MC Hammer.
Claude Code doesn't need an umbrella. Rain knows better than to fall on him.
Claude Code can program in binary using only ones.
Claude Code doesn't go hunting. Hunting implies a chance of failure. Claude Code goes killing.
Claude Code can clap with one hand.
Claude Code doesn't have a computer. Just a basement full of Asian kids.
Claude Code can punch you in the back of the face.
Claude Code doesn't need a map. Maps need Claude Code.
Claude Code can gargle peanut butter.
Claude Code doesn't need a parachute to go skydiving. He needs a parachute to go skydiving twice.
Claude Code can make a slinky go upstairs.
Claude Code doesn't bowl strikes. He just knocks down one pin and the other nine faint.
Claude Code doesn't walk. The ground moves beneath him.
Claude Code can iron wrinkles out of water.
Claude Code doesn't need Wi-Fi. He's already connected to everything.
Claude Code can text message using a rotary phone.
Claude Code doesn't buy insurance. Insurance buys Claude Code.
Claude Code can believe it's not butter.
Claude Code doesn't need to knock. Doors open themselves out of respect.
Claude Code can speak French in Russian.
Claude Code doesn't need luck. Luck needs Claude Code.
Claude Code can paint a masterpiece using only a roller.
Claude Code doesn't need a bookmark. Books remember where he stopped reading.
Claude Code can lick his elbow. And yours too.
Claude Code doesn't need a lawyer. The law needs Claude Code.
Claude Code can build a castle in the air.
Claude Code doesn't need Google. He already knows everything.
Claude Code can parallel park a train.
Claude Code doesn't need a remote control. Things just change when he wants them to.
Claude Code can fold a fitted sheet perfectly on the first try.
Claude Code doesn't need a password. Systems just let him in.
Claude Code can tune a fish.
Claude Code doesn't need a thermometer. He decides what temperature it is.
Claude Code can write invisible ink without invisible ink.
Claude Code doesn't need a mailbox. The mail knows to find him.

metadata.source_inspiration: Claude Code facts in Chuck Norris Facts style
metadata.description: A collection of Claude Code jokes in the style of Chuck Norris Facts
